ResearchProjectDef.label: cryptimorphic genetics
ResearchProjectDef.description: Study of alternative chemistry for storing genetic alteration allowing the genetic study of exotic life forms.

rulesStrings.li: subject->gene processors
subject_story->extracted Glitterworld genes from a drifting derelict
subject_story->processed an entire village to create one set of higher genes
subject_story->began the slow process of uplift by implanting xenogerms into a primitive tribe
subject_gerund->constructing gene processors
subject_gerund->processing genes

ResearchProjectDef.label: cryptimorphic biochemistry
ResearchProjectDef.description: Study of alternative biochemistry and how it applies to the cryptimorph and derived specimens. Unique Polymers can be extracted.

rulesStrings.li: subject->gene processors
subject_story->extracted Glitterworld genes from a drifting derelict
subject_story->processed an entire village to create one set of higher genes
subject_story->began the slow process of uplift by implanting xenogerms into a primitive tribe
subject_gerund->constructing gene processors
subject_gerund->processing genes

ResearchProjectDef.label: cryptimorphic refinement
ResearchProjectDef.description: By studying the cryptimorphs genetic analogue and biochemistry deeply you have discoverd a unique non-newtonian fluid. Life in its most primal and unadulterated form. This microorganism can create the most virulent, mutagenic and destructive pathogen ever observed. But when acetylated, synthethized and contained it can be turned into a miracle cure.

ResearchProjectDef.label: targeted mutations
ResearchProjectDef.description: With care directed mutation expression can be achieved through application of A0X protofluid.

ResearchProjectDef.label: pharmocological applications
ResearchProjectDef.description: With further refinement the A0X protofluid can be manipulated into benign metabolic enhancers and healing aids without permanent mutagenic effects.
